Articles.Content: With 0.15 out, will this be updated?
Does it need to be ? It doesn\'t use any plugins, so it should be fine.

I\'m using it and it works just fine.

Great mod btw!

With 0.15 out, will this be updated?

I have plans to update. But... once again, I\'ve promised an update on January, and still haven\'t made it...

So don\'t believe me ;P
Do you plan on making an Agena for 0.16?

Do you plan on making an Agena for 0.16?
Nope.

I\'d like just to update Gemini with normal maps and RCS ports. When I time (and mood) to do it
Well, at least we know that you still think about this.There is always hope

I saw this pop up on a flying visit to the forums and thought I\'d say thanks for what is my favourite part mod for KSP. Then I thought that wasn\'t self serving enough and wondered if the parts for the Big Gemini had been considered.

Cheers,

M
can one of you send me the DL link it won\'t work for me. Email: [email protected]
The download link works fine, I just tried it now.

I saw this pop up on a flying visit to the forums and thought I\'d say thanks for what is my favourite part mod for KSP. Then I thought that wasn\'t self serving enough and wondered if the parts for the Big Gemini had been considered.

Cheers,

M

@firebar: Big Gemini? I like the way you think! 8)

@Tosh: one: Why can\'t I attach RCS to the sides? Two: Can I edit the .cfg to make this possible?

@Tosh: one: Why can\'t I attach RCS to the sides? Two: Can I edit the .cfg to make this possible?

Change attachRules parameter to 

// attachment rules: stack, srfAttach, allowStack, allowSrfAttach, allowCollision
attachRules = 1,0,1,1,0
Oh man this mod is the greatest. An update for it would be the coolest thing ever. And it would be even cooler if there was a Big Gemini released!

Hey man, can you set it so we can put things(landing gear/RCS)on the sides of parts? i landed on Minmus with this mod but without landing gear i blew up the engine and was forced to send a rescue mission. 8)

Change attachRules parameter to 

// attachment rules: stack, srfAttach, allowStack, allowSrfAttach, allowCollision
attachRules = 1,0,1,1,0

Do that, it should work.

Thanks

Eh, which ones do you mean? RCS nozzles just painted on the texture -- or a main engine in the bottom? :

Seems like Agenda can be done of NovaPunch parts. It looks quite similar

Any chance of you telling us how to build it?

Any chance of you telling us how to build it?

There\'s a picture in the first post showing how to build it.

When I got this, I made a few changes. I want to suggest something, Tosh. Add thrusters to this. The real Gemini used thrusters to change its orbit, not the retro fire engines.

And also, you guys will probably want NovaPunch to make the Titan II GLV by the way... You\'ll have to also modify your NovaPunch textures to match the paint scheme of the Titan II.

Dear Tosh,

Will you be updating this with an interior for IVA\'s , say yes, saaay it.

Dear Tosh,

Will you be updating this with an interior for IVA\'s , say yes, saaay it.

I\'d like to look at IVA implementation before answering that.

Also keep in mind that, unlike KSP pods, Gemini had crew of 2. I wonder will modders be able to configure crew capacity in 0.16 release?

UPD. And, uh, are you aware just what Gemini pod was? A cramped capsule with two seats and two tiny windows (really tiny, I mean it); crewmen were unable even to leave their seats without opening pod hatches first. I doubt that could make an interesting IVA experience...
Are youkidding, of course it would! its about atmosphere and immersion man. and yes they will be configurable. Can we get a solid 'I\'ll try'?

Are youkidding, of course it would! its about atmosphere and immersion man. and yes they will be configurable. Can we get a solid 'I\'ll try'?
Modelling pod\'s interior is quite an amount of job. And what for? To switch to IVA view just once and see there\'s not much to do here? :

Also remember that crew had very little control on the flight itself. Most of those dials and buttons you see in the photo controlled radio transmissions (not implemented in KSP), life support (the same), and equipment tests ( :). Only orientation, transition and stage separation controls might make some sense. A little sense, given that you can barely see something through that windows)))

Man, it\'s not Appolo. It just took off, made a couple of maneuvers, and landed
maybe for those like me who would fliy entirely in IVA as a simulation. It would really be gorgeous and add to one of the better part mods on here.
I have to agree with rusty, it would be great to have it.It is indeed a lot of work, but a lot of people would like it
I mean, you put forth so much work before, do you not care as much now?
